mapper.insert: INSERT INTO awards (user_id, award_name, award_level, award_date, issuing_authority, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{awardName}, #{awardLevel}, #{awardDate}, #{issuingAuthority}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE awards SET award_name = #{awardName}, award_level = #{awardLevel}, award_date = #{awardDate}, issuing_authority = #{issuingAuthority}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
